ProfileName: # Use this sheet to define settings for Server profile connection to be created in OneView.
# If the row starts with '#' it will be ignored by the script
# DOES NOT apply to RACK Servers (DL)

HostOSType:
# Specify the Host OS type, which will set the Host OS value when 
# HPE OneView created the Host object on the Storage System.
# Note: 1 OS type for all disks
# Accepted values are:
#     CitrixXen = "Citrix Xen Server 5.x/6.x"
#     AIX       = "AIX"
#     IBMVIO    = "IBM VIO Server"
#     RHEL4     = "RHE Linux (Pre RHEL 5)"
#     RHEL3     = "RHE Linux (Pre RHEL 5)"
#     RHEL      = "RHE Linux (5.x, 6.x)"
#     RHEV      = "RHE Virtualization (5.x, 6.x)"
#     VMware    = "ESX 4.x/5.x"
#     Win2k3    = "Windows 2003"
#     Win2k8    = "Windows 2008/2008 R2"
#     Win2k12   = "Windows 2012 / WS2012 R2"
#     OpenVMS   = "OpenVMS"
#     Egenera   = "Egenera"
#     Exanet    = "Exanet"
#     Solaris9  = "Solaris 9/10"
#     Solaris10 = "Solaris 9/10"
#     Solaris11 = "Solaris 11"
#     ONTAP     = "NetApp/ONTAP"
#     OEL       = "OE Linux UEK (5.x, 6.x)"
#     HPUX11iv1 = "HP-UX (11i v1, 11i v2)"
#     HPUX11iv2 = "HP-UX (11i v1, 11i v2)"
#     HPUX11iv3 = "HP-UX (11i v3)"
#     SUSE      = "SuSE (10.x, 11.x)"
#     SUSE9     = "SuSE Linux (Pre SLES 10)"
VolumeName:
# List of volume names 
# Use '|' as separator
LUN:
#List of LUN numbers
Use '|'  as separator
